column1: '''Haleth the Hunter''' was one of the Fathers of Men
column2: who first appears in [[The Quenta]] as the son of [[Hador]]
column4: p. 104.</ref> later as the leader of one of the Three Houses of Men
column5: <ref>See e.g. {{GA|122}} (born in Eriador in F.A. 388); {{GA|129}} (comes into Beleriand with his people); {{GA|126}} (his son Hundor born in F.A. 413).</ref> until his character was replaced by '''[[Haleth|Lady Haleth]]'''.<ref>{{WJ|14}}
